00050 #if defined(USE_GSTREAMER)
00051 
00052 // On Windows we don't have configure script to turn this on or off,
00053 // so let's use msw-specific pragma to add required libraries.
00054 // Of course, library search path still has to be updated manually
00055 #   if defined(__WXMSW__)
00056 #      pragma comment(lib,"libgstreamer-0.10.lib")
00057 #      pragma comment(lib,"libgstapp-0.10.lib")
00058 #      pragma comment(lib,"libgstbase-0.10.lib")
00059 #      pragma comment(lib,"glib-2.0.lib")
00060 #      pragma comment(lib,"gobject-2.0.lib")
00061 #      pragma comment(lib,"gthread-2.0.lib")
00062 #      pragma comment(lib,"libxml2.lib")
00063 #   endif
00064     extern "C" {
00065 #      include <gst/gst.h>
00066 #      include <glib.h>
00067 #      include <glib/gstdio.h>
00068     }
00069 
00070 bool LoadGStreamer(bool showerror);
00071 
00072 gboolean LogStructure(GQuark field_id, const GValue *value, gpointer user_data);
